author: AuroraPerego
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements the MC truth information for MTD at the cluster level.
The `simCluster`s creation follows the logic of the `CaloTruthAccumulator` and after that two additional collections are created: the `MtdSimLayerCluster` and the `MtdSimTrackster` (naming adapted from HGCAL). 

- `MtdSimLayerCluster`: these are created with the same logic of the reconstructed clusters. The `simCluster`s are splitted based on the sub detector / layer (for ETL) / module and on the requirement of having hits in adjacents rows / columns. The time associated to these clusters is the average of the hits' time weighted on the energy. These objects will be useful for the Mtd Validation, e.g. to optimize the clustering in the barrel. 
- `MtdSimTrackster`: these are created linking `MtdSimLayerCluster`s associated to the same `simTrack`. The time associated to these tracksters is the time of the first `simHit`. These objects will be useful within the TICL reconstruction to improve linking between MTD and HGCAL objects.

In addition, a new class `MTDGeomUtil` has been created to ease the process of obtaining hits position, layer, module, etc..

This follows the PR #41318 that had the consequence of more `simHit`s being saved in each `simCluster`.

#### PR validation:
The results have been checked on wf 20891.0, looking at single pions.
